casebody.data:
In the Matter of Benjamin BALISH, Bankrupt-Appellant, Horace G. Pender, Trustee-Appellee. No. 400. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 19, 1939. Myers & Guerin, of New York City (Joseph K. Guerin, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Julius Zizmor, of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed on opinion below.
